<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.DiffMergeUICheck</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description>Determines if Diff Merge tool is supported in the current UI. Returns string of 'true' or 'false'</description> <name>DiffMergeUICheck</name> <script><![CDATA[var DiffMergeUICheck = Class.create(); DiffMergeUICheck.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
isUISupported : function() { return GlideMobileExtensions.getDeviceType() == 'doctype'; },
type: 'DiffMergeUICheck' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-06-30 23:52:42</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6b4f3b9097010200abe4bb7503ac4a04</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>DiffMergeUICheck</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Merge Tool" source="com.glide.ui.mergetool">6e3d70476d2220100acb70b35343307a</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6b4f3b9097010200abe4bb7503ac4a04</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-07-01 00:00:00</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>243</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
